capability.name: Customer Tax Handling
capability.definition: This service domain handles consumer tax reporting obligations including the consolidation and reporting of customer tax related financial activity
capability.role: There are different tax tracking and reporting obligations for products and services in different locations and jurisdictions. This service domain handles the consolidation and reporting of tax related activity as necessary for a customer. Note that this service domain is only responsible for the consolidation and reporting of tax related activity - other service domains will be required to handle actual tax processing obligations as may apply for certain products and services
capability.example: A consumer customer is provided with a year end tax report for products and services provided by the bank

key_features.name: Maintain the customer tax reporting obligations
key_features.description: Enables maintain the customer tax reporting obligations to support this service domain handles consumer tax reporting obligations including the consolidation and reporting of customer tax related financial activity

key_features.name: Consolidate product/service tax related activity/transaction details
key_features.description: Enables consolidate product/service tax related activity/transaction details to support this service domain handles consumer tax reporting obligations including the consolidation and reporting of customer tax related financial activity

key_features.name: Analyse financial activity and assemble customer tax reports
key_features.description: Enables analyse financial activity and assemble customer tax reports to support this service domain handles consumer tax reporting obligations including the consolidation and reporting of customer tax related financial activity
